price: (17) And those who are guided - He increases them in guidance and gives them their righteousness.[1500]
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱهۡتَدَوۡاْ زَادَهُمۡ هُدٗى وَءَاتَىٰهُمۡ تَقۡوَىٰهُمۡ
footnotes: [1500]- Taqwā, meaning piety, consciousness and fear of Allāh, and care to avoid His displeasure.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna ih'tadaw zādahum hudan waātāhum taqwāhum
